titleStmt.title: To the Kings most excellent Majesty, the humble petition of Thomas Kynaston, merchant, George Porter, Esq; son and heir of Endimion Porter Esq; adventurers in the joint stock with Sir William Courten to the East-Indies, George Carew Esq; administrator of Sir William Courten ...
titleStmt.author: Kynaston, Thomas.
Carew, George, Esq.
Porter, George, Esq.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
